body:
## Requirement - what kind of business use case are you trying to solve?

All code should be run through standard linters

## Problem - what in Jaeger blocks you from solving the requirement?

```
$ make go-lint
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/app is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/app/defaults is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/app/exporter is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/app/exporter/cassandra is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/app/exporter/elasticsearch is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/app/exporter/grpcplugin is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/app/exporter/jaegerexporter is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/app/exporter/kafka is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/app/processor/resourceprocessor is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/app/receiver/jaegerreceiver is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/app/receiver/kafka is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/cmd/agent is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/cmd/collector is outside main module
go: directory cmd/opentelemetry-collector/cmd/ingester is outside main module
```
cc @pavolloffay
title: golint does not run in cmd/opentelemetry-collector
